FixEntity.Description:
Max Payne 3 Fix v1.0 https://github.com/Lyall/MaxPayne3Fix
This is a fix for several issues with ultrawide/wider displays in Max Payne 3.
Corrects >2.3 aspect ratios causing the game to enter multi-monitor mode. Stops fullscreen mode from using your highest-available resolution. (Thanks Rose!) Correctly scaled FMV playback. Correctly scaled loading screens. Spanned or centred 16:9 HUD adjustment. Gameplay FOV adjustment without affecting cutscenes/other camera types.
REQUIRES ASI Loader
